issue.title: Programatically updating lights yields a false error

content.raw:
How odd. I will see if I can reduce my code to a small snippet that you can test in isolation. I might only be able to do this in a week from now, because I'm travelling north to see the solar eclipse (woo hoo!).

Unfortunately, I cannot use the AttachLightPlugin for my application, because two lights must be added for each robot that is inserted, and the number of robots is not hard-coded in the world file. I like that plugin, though!
content.html:
How odd. I will see if I can reduce my code to a small snippet that you can test in isolation. I might only be able to do this in a week from now, because I'm travelling north to see the solar eclipse (woo hoo!).

Unfortunately, I cannot use the AttachLightPlugin for my application, because two lights must be added for each robot that is inserted, and the number of robots is not hard-coded in the world file. I like that plugin, though!
